cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("convert")

	CONVERT("", "src", "long")
	CONVERT("dst", "src", "long")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: convert
processors:
  - convert:
      tag: convert_src_to_long_d695a96a
      field: src
      type: long
  - convert:
      tag: convert_src_to_long_into_dst_dd0d12bb
      field: src
      type: long
      target_field: dst
